sections.remark: Try adding more fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and proteins into your diet.

questionRemarks.remark: Consider fueling your health with nature's bounty- fruits and veggies!
questionRemarks.question: I eat at least 3 cups of fruits and vegetables every day.

questionRemarks.remark: Choose health, skip fast food- opt for nutritious alternatives instead.
questionRemarks.question: I eat at fast food restaurants less than thrice a week.

questionRemarks.remark: How about having fibrous foods to shield your digestive health?
questionRemarks.question: I include fibrous foods like whole grain breads, cereals, beans in my diet.

questionRemarks.remark: Embrace health, ditch high-fat foods.
questionRemarks.question: I avoid eating fatty foods such as whole milk, fried foods, fatty meats, etc.

questionRemarks.remark: Try to incorporate more protein into your daily meals.
questionRemarks.question: I eat protein-rich foods like milk products, meat, fish, beans, etc.

sections.remark: Healthy lifestyle enhances well-being, reduces chronic disease risk. Incorporate habits: sleep, hydration, exercise.

questionRemarks.remark: Your sleep patterns are average, but optimizing them can enhance your overall health.
questionRemarks.question: How many hours of sleep do you get each night?

questionRemarks.remark: Improve water intake consistency for optimal hydration.
questionRemarks.question: How many glasses of water do you drink each day?

questionRemarks.remark: Take charge of substance intake for improved health habits.
questionRemarks.question: I avoid the use of tobacco products (cigarettes, smokeless tobacco, cigars, and pipes) and limit myself to 5 drinks of alcohol a week. (beer, liquor, wine)

questionRemarks.remark: A long commute is time-consuming and exhausting for you.
questionRemarks.question: Is your one-sided commute time  more than an hour ?

questionRemarks.remark: Beware of excessive screen usage as it can adversely affect your productivity, mental health, and overall well-being.
questionRemarks.question: How often are you addicted to online streaming services?

questionRemarks.remark: You must consider incorporating regular exercise for better health.
questionRemarks.question: I engage in physical activity at least half an hour, 5 days a week.

questionRemarks.remark: Embrace variety in your exercise: Stretching, aerobics, and strength training.
questionRemarks.question: My physical activity includes stretching, aerobic activity, and strength training.

questionRemarks.remark: Choose stairs over elevators, walk instead of driving- for a healthier lifestyle.
questionRemarks.question: I prioritize alternative transportation- taking stairs, biking, walking whenever feasible.

questionRemarks.remark: Break free from inactivity and embrace the benefits of an active lifestyle.
questionRemarks.question: I choose physical activity over inactivity.

questionRemarks.remark: Take charge of your health- prioritize regular health checkups.
questionRemarks.question: I see my physician for routine checkups, health screenings, and disease prevention.

sections.remark: Try reducing stress for better well-being. Try relaxation techniques, therapy support.

questionRemarks.remark: Openness in workplace issues reduces stress. Seek support.
questionRemarks.question: Do you feel like you are able to speak honestly about your issues in the workplace?

questionRemarks.remark: Manage stress, anxiety, and depression for well-being.
questionRemarks.question: How often do you experience stress, anxiety, or depression?

questionRemarks.remark: Consider finding ways to increase your work autonomy.
questionRemarks.question: How satisfied are you with the amount of control you have over the work you do?

questionRemarks.remark: Consider maintaining your  work-life balance which can improve your overall well-being and reduce stress.
questionRemarks.question: I am satisfied with the balance between my work time and leisure time.

sections.remark: Caring for your emotional and mental health can help you in numerous ways.

questionRemarks.remark: Prioritize quality time with loved ones for stronger bonds and lasting memories.
questionRemarks.question: How satisfied do you feel with the amount of quality time spent with your closed ones?

questionRemarks.remark: Practice meditation or Yoga for inner peace, mindfulness, and well-being.
questionRemarks.question: How often do you meditate or practice Yoga?

questionRemarks.remark: Express anger and frustration constructively, promoting understanding and resolution. Seek healthier outlets and effective communication strategies.
questionRemarks.question: I express my feelings of anger and frustration in ways that are not hurtful to myself or others.

questionRemarks.remark: Set realistic objectives and pursue them with determination. Unlock your potential for personal growth and success.
questionRemarks.question: I set reasonable objectives for myself and strive to accomplish them.

questionRemarks.remark: Embrace responsibility, foster growth and positive relationships.
questionRemarks.question: I take responsibility for my actions and understand the effects they have on others.

questionRemarks.remark: Seek workplace awards/acknowledgements in the next 3 months. Show your dedication and excel!
questionRemarks.question: I have received awards/acknowledgements in my workplace in the past 3 months.
